data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Phek, Nagaland, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Phek, Nagaland, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Phek, Nagaland, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Phek, Nagaland, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 163,400 people living in the county of Phek.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Assamese (Sikh traditions) people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 163,400 people living in Phek through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Phek.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Phek, Nagaland, India has a population of 163,400.

We estimate Phek has 1,797 people who might know Jesus, 1,983 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 159,620 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Phek, Nagaland, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

location.name: Phek
location.people_groups_list: Thakali, Tai Taroi, Patni (Hindu traditions), Mahara, Assamese (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Thakali (1,500), Tai Taroi (2,100), Patni (Hindu traditions) (226,000), Mahara (4,800), Assamese (Muslim traditions) (2,691,000)
